hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever catches one Rak'ah of the 'Asr before the sun sets, then he has caught it, and whoever catches one Rak'ah of the Subh before the sun rises, then he has caught it

chapter.ara-name: باب وَقْتِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْعُذْرِ وَالضَّرُورَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Time Of Prayer When One has An Excuse Or In Cases Of Necessity
